document_name: Law on Renewable Energy Sources and Highly Effective Cogeneration
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/HRV/2015/HRV-2015-10-09-Law on Renewable Energy Sources and Highly Effective Cogeneration_f6f81c93c5bac92b5ca32b68ceb471ac.pdf
document_description: The purpose of this law is to create a regulatory framework to promote the production of electricity from renewable energy sources and high efficiency co-generation, and to create incentives for consuming energy from renewable sources. It creates a support system for renewable energy production facilities in the form of a market premium and a guaranteed purchase price for installations smaller than 30 kW. The law outlines the process of public procurement in which renewable energy projects must participate to qualify for government support.
